name: Eduardo Trujillo
label: Software Developer
summary: Software Engineer passionate about building scalable and resilient applications. Deep knowledge about different scalable architectures, including the trade-offs, the best DB for each service, and the best methodologies and practices, helping me to keep a product focus. Experience with Agile, TDD and CI/CD to offer the best customer experience, including automation, monitoring, cybersecurity and knowledge in deploy tools like Docker or Kubernetes to add best value.

work.title: BACKEND-DEVELOPER
summary: • Designed and optimized REST APIs using Python (FastAPI, Django) for scalable applications, aligning with microservice architecture principles.
• Implemented backend services deployed on AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, API Gateway) to enhance platform performance by 20%.
• Enhanced database efficiency through SQL query optimization, resulting in a 30% reduction in execution time.
• Built Microservice infrastructure using Event-Driven architecture, RabbitMQ, AsyncAPI, and Kubernetes, demonstrating expertise in modern backend technologies.
• Collaborated in Agile team settings, actively participating in code reviews and unit testing to uphold software quality standards.

work.title: WEB DEVELOPER
summary: • Developed and maintained web applications using Javascript, CSS, HTML, and PHP, showcasing backend development skills in a customer-facing digital platform context.
• Improved website SEO and load speed, increasing site traffic by 40% and aligning with best practices in software quality and DevOps.
• Implemented security best practices to reduce vulnerabilities by 85%, ensuring the reliability and security of the platform.
• Mentored junior developers to enhance team productivity and foster a culture of continuous learning and improvement.

project.name: inventory Management System
project.description: A web application for managing inventory, built with Django and PostgreSQL, designed to handle large datasets efficiently.

project.name: ChatBot App
project.description: A chatbot application that integrates with OpenAI's API to provide conversational AI capabilities.

project.name: Recipe API
project.description: A RESTful API for managing recipes, built with Django and designed to handle a large number of requests efficiently.

project.name: Customize NotePad
project.description: A customizable notepad application built with Python and Tkinter, allowing users to create and manage notes easily.

project.name: QR Manager
project.description: An Android application for managing QR codes, built with Kotlin to provide a user-friendly interface for scanning and generating QR codes.
